name: Arcade Game 02: Space Attackers(Demo)
description:
#retro #arcade #spaceshooter #action

Arcade Game 02 - Space Attackers(Demo)

Sequel to the first game "Balloon Collector". This space-shooter action based game will focus on shooting enemies, from outer space........WHOA!!

This game includes:

  • Shooting enemy UFOs as you can in each different levels to gain amounts of score points....
  • Few items to use in your struggles against these evil invaders, and....
  • Beat the last boss and you're free to go....(Um, this wasn't necessary)

Reminder:  "Demo is out now, so definitely check it out as well"!!

(Instructions about this game: Download the "ZIP" file here, then extract it out and read the "GameUpdate 02" text file before playing it, I've already mentioned about my own reasons for doing it, so check it out as well!!)

(This is just a demo for this game, more changes will be made in the full version filled with more levels, more bosses to beat and few extras to check out.

Also, all of my games were free-to-play so there's nothing to worry about purchasing this since I don't promote games with price tags embedded on it.)
